Domain Spell@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Pushing Gust]{Pushing Gust};Advanced Domain Spell@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Disperse into Air]{Disperse into Air}

You can control winds and the weather.
name: Air Domain
